name: Loop Warrior
description:
-LOOP WARRIOR-

Pixel art game,  Adventure Dungeon Games.

Help this little warrior to explore the dungeon

Control :

MovePress 'A'  for move Left,  Press 'D' for  move RightJumpWInteractionSpaceRestartRLoop PositionQ and E

Enjoy and i hope you like this game.

Thanks For Playing!!
